values:
1. Don't Look Back Into The Sun - The Libertines
I only got into The Libs this year and this song has made an appearence on every single mix CD I have made. I love love love it, and the intro gets me EVERY time.

2. France - Carl Barat
Because Carl's a poet too. OK Peter?

3. Razorlight - America
Just because it's a gorgeous song and I still haven't figured out if it makes me happy or sad.

4. Empire - Kasabian
I think this song was totally different to anything else this year, and it's fucking GREAT for a sleazy wee dance too.

5. Chelsea Dagger - The Fratellis
Anyone who hasn't heard this song is either been away for a long time, or deaf. And it has the catchiest intro of any song ever ever.

6. Deadwood - Dirty Pretty Things
Uft, everyone knows why. And also because it's just good, and I love the lyrics. HELLO bitchy Carlos.

7. Rehab - Amy Winehouse 
Best.female.artist.of the last 10 years. end of. And this song is fucking quality.

8. 8 Dead Boys - Babyshambles
Because it's hot as fuck. I can't be arsed with big rambly sentences ok.

9. Ribticklin - Drew McConnell
The words are.... worrying, the melody is gorgeous and the backing vocals are haunting.

10. Pornography - Client ft Carl Barat
NNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG

11. Janie Jones - Babyshambles & co
It's the best ever to dance about to. And clearly, Drew in a police uniform is a marvel.

12. Over and Over - Hotchip
Laaaaaay back, laaaaaay back. Sleazy as hell. Love it.

13. Shoot the Runner - Kasabian
Because Tom Meighan saying "she's my queen, bitch" makes my stomach go funny.

14. Venus in Furs - The Velvet Underground
Envokes a similar reaction as number 10.

15. Lying is The Most Fun A Girl Can Have Without Taking Her Clothes Off - Panic! At The Disco
The words are sleazy.as.fuck. And seeing it live transformed me from girl to woman. Or something similar. nff.

16. Tis A Pity She's A Whore - Kill City
Yes it is. Tis also a pity I didn't get into Kill City sooner.

17. I Get Along - The Libertines
FUCK EM. Love love love love love.

18. Everywhere - Yellowcard
It's a cover version yes, but it's better than the original and I adore it. The intro, the way it goes all manic, the violins. *shivers*

19. Loyalty Song - Babyshambles 
Possibly the most adorable song ever.

20. Dance Dance - Fall Out Boy
Because I learned the Pete Wentz dance, and also because it reminds me of someone. And us doing the Wentz dance haha.

P33N OF D00M.

WELJTO3RIHFOEHGOEHGLKWRGLKWHNGLKWHLOWHGKLLHGLQKWQ;OWIGJEORJGLKESJFLKD

KATIE IS A LEGEND OF SORTS FOR SUPPLYING ME WITH PHOTOGRAPHIC EVIDENCE. 

WEHIRFOQWEHIWFGKEBFGLWKGBFRKFWFWQRFG
and peter messaged me. god, i am practically famous. ish.

mairead nash is talking to me on msn. and just invited me to london to one of QoN nights.

*dead*

carl barat has the bulge to end all bulges.

i think part of my brain is dead.
thank you baby jesus

actually. i'm sitting crying now, and i should be in a good mood.

it's nice to know that two of my best friends want to spend time with me on new years eve. or at least that they would let me know about it.

i am bored. although, i have dicovered the joys and delights of albion fic, so yeah. 

i swear to god the advert for white noise 2 needs to fuck off. first time it was scary, now it's feeble. 

in other news, fitman texted me tonight which was glorious, because fitman REALLY is fucking fit. and now.... to find out his name. 

also, seriously, if i don't get a noel/russell fic i am going to die. and then come back to haunt all the fic writers in britain. the swines.

someone buy me a barat for new year? x

I am pure ridiculously bored. I didn't wake up properly til half 4, which was lazyness in the extreme. And now I have nothing to do. At all. I could fair go a trip to the pub.

And I still want a Noel/Russell fic. Please please.

write me a russell brand/noel fielding fic. because the actual thought of makes me squeal in a gothgasmy bubble of happiness.

it can just be a one hit, nothing fancy, but make it sleazy cos everyone and their granny knows that caroline moreland is a fan of the sleeeeeeaaze.

thankyouplz

was not as good as it should have been. it started off great, then sharon left for her boyfriend which pissed me off. and we were sitting ALL night, hardly any dancing which also pissed me off. 

so then jenna and kerry left early to go to craigs, and since i wasnt going to sit in firewater alone, i left too a bit behind them. but then i lost them and they were at craigs already and since fit man i was with wasn't allowed to go i didn't fancy walking up myself in the dark. so i went to subway with fit man and friend and then fit man got in a fight. which was hot, but scary. he THREW a man through the window in subway. and some guy ran into me and i fell and now i have a swollen knee, 2 cut elbows, a cut finger and a bruised hip. and then fit man got blood ALL fucking down my leg.

but they got a taxi home with me and i pulled fit man and got his number which was joyous.


although, i am stopping drinking so much. when i think how much of a fucking dangerous situation i put myself in last night, it scares me. alone with 2 strange men who were fighing and me hardly being able to walk cos of my knee. although things turned out ok, it's just fucking stupid.

this has been one of the shitest christmad day's ever. 

i'm sitting alone in my room bored mindless, my mum and dad keep bickering and my brothers gone out. lynsey has decided to be a complete cunt and invite me to her auntie's then not bother phoning me, like she PROMISED she would. 

then my grandad phones me close to tears and says my grans been taken into hospital with suspected pneumonia and he's lonely.

how incredibly shite.
i got a rock and roll legends book and a johnny depp calender. oh i am a happy chappy.

HAPPY CHRISTMAS EVERYBODY!

i am pure beside myself with glee. i got:

from parents: polaroid camera and 3 film strips, CD player, mp3 player, 2 pairs of jammies, 2 jumpers, up the brakcet australian edition, the libertines, waterloo to anywhere with bonus dvd (ksdhfsfsdfsklfa), NME album, grease dvd, pirates of the carribean 2, breakfast at tiffany's, hair care set, lipgloss set, fishnets (my dad was less than amused), cosy socks (!), box of chocolates, necklace, coat from topshop, jacket from topshop. belter!

from iain: best of girls aloud album, soap and glory set. (i nearly died. i've wanted a soap and glory kit for aaaaaaages!)

from jenna: leather notebook, 2 magazine cd's i wanted off her haha.

from kerry: scarf from tie rack and topshop earrings.

and my grans and auntie gave me money. HELLO topshop denims sale!!

*takes polaroids of everything in sight and dances to Up The Bracket!*

was actually, amazing. got royally pished in kerry's house and had great food and good fun. and holy hell her uncle derek is actually an older version of carl barat. i nearly died. except it's very wrong to fancy kerry's uncle so.... yeah.

then we headed off to the sauchiehall and met emily of doom and stu and flo. and had a few drinks then sauntered on down to the buff club. grand.

music on all floors was excellent, especially on the ground floor where craig was DJ'ing. HE PLAYED I WISH! HE PLAYED I WIIIIIIIIIIIIISH! i died a wee bit. 

then it was a very drunken stumble up to the chippy for steak pie suppers. i could barely stand up because i am an alcoholic.

so yes, all in all a very very good night out. gutted about emily though, missed her man. 

kerry, hope you had a good birthday and as much fun as i think you did!!

xxx

ooooooooooh i don't why she infiriates me so much but i really want to stab her skanky little eyes out with a fork. and then kick her ribcage a couple of times. 

it so SILLY, because she's really never done anything wrong except for be the girlfriend of my imaginary husband. but STILL. 

she insults me with her pretend prettyness but really she's just a boy. and all of sudden she's all "look at me and **** aren't we cute" 

naw hen, he is. ya bass.

i should be on my way to work, instead i am on the couch shivering and feeling like death. if i am not better for saturday, i am going to cry black tears. or something.

someone make me feel better. xx

On the twelfth day of Christmas, almondlooks sent to me...
Twelve inxs drumming
Eleven hugs piping
Ten gigs a-leaping
Nine boys dancing
Eight rings acting
Seven cigarettes a-singing
Six magazines a-dancing
Five che-e-e-eekbones
Four leather jackets
Three hollywood icons
Two keith richards
...and a make-up in a peter doherty.
Get your own Twelve Days:
i actually LOVE this. peter doherty in make up? yes please.

"He thinks he's some sort of god doesn't he?" "He just stood there while I was on stage. He's a bit wierd." about Carl Barat Aaaaaaaw hen, it'd be a good idea for you to walk into an oil rig holding a lit match. Seriously, the bitch makes me suicidal. What the fuck right does she have to be slagging anyone, let along Carlos? (yes, I'm biased, fuck off.) I swear, I'd like to meet her and spit in her eye. Then piss on her. Cow. This is all.

Was a proper riot. People in my work are loony, not even kidding. I, as per, was fucking trolleyed. Met someone I met at halloween and he insisted on buying me 9234 drinks. So yeah, I was sozzled. Suffering for it now mind you. So the heels on my shoes are wrecked and I have a lovely big stain down my dress. I am too classy. I pulled Superman again (christ) and apparently some other man John who has my number and msn addy. Hope he's prepared to join the blocked numbers list. *shamless tramp*

So yeah, basically a field day for unclassy drunken tramps like myself. Yassssss.

xx

i want me a slice of carl cake.

also, anyone have bebo? it's confusing me senseless and i don't know why everyone raves about it so much. PISH is what it is. PISH i tell thee.

i wish i had something interesting to say. but no. instead i am going to moan about my humungous appetite and how it's stopping me from losing any weight. the swine.

my mum put the deccies up tonight and the living room looks gorgeous. seriously. aaaw. aaaaw. 

also, i think i am in love with mark owen. i seem to have a pure attraction to short, long haired men. gads.

ALSO, on friday i am going to buy: the june issue of dummy magazine, carl barat:under the influence cd and also something else, and i can't remember what. hmm. but it IS carl barat related, i remember that much.

god, i half expect the restraining order to come through the door one day. 

RIGHT, i'm off for more chilli nacho goodness. and to listen to take that.

xxx

they were decent man. high point for me were Pipedown, Killamangiro, What Katie Did, Fuck Forever, Time For Heroes and Janie Jones. Low points were Sedative, The General just being there and... thats it. Everything else was just ok. 

Then we met Mick and he gave me the guys box of pringles and was very nice. And Adam was very nice. And, Peter was getting treated like an animal and I felt SO sorry for him. And Drew. Drew. Me and Jenna and Kerry got a photo with him and he was lovely. He looked terrified the whole time he met the fans and when he went "nothing is working tonight" I felt soo awfu for him. People seem to forget that these guys are just people, you wouldn't grab someone like that in street. Anyway, Jenna was great, she coped well with meeting Drew and didn't even cry or throw up. Yaye!!

SO yeah. In general, the night was good. Not fantastic. But good. The gig pure didn't leave me with an "ohmygodhowcananythingcomparetothis" feeling like Dirty Pretty Things did on Friday. But I'm biased. And DPT are better. :p

I'm starting a Libertines related foodstuffs collection. I already have some water and a box of pringles with crumbs in. I need a chocolate bar wrapper and we're good to go. 

I need to stop talking. xxx

i have some photos from the gig, courtesy of emily gillies and her fabulous(?) photography skills.

but first, the setlist.

chinese dogs
wondering
doctors and dealers
england
burma
france (those 2 after each other nearly killed me)
gentry cove
deadwood
no signal no battery
one to my left (!!)
death on the stairs
good old days
blood thirsty bastards
you fucking love it
the enemy
gin and milk
bang bang
(encore)
in the city (cover the the jam song)
last of the small town play boys
i get along (!!!!!!)


excellent setlist i think. and now, photos of doom.


me in the pub. never too cool for a myspace pose.


I'M NOT DRUNK YOU CUNTS! WHO YOU TALKING TO! or something.


























GARRYY!!!!!!!!!!!


stu: "OMG I JUST MET GARY OMG". i nearly died laughing. aaaaw.


aaaaw.


someone i picked up in the street. he was dying to get a photo with me. stalker.


and then the cunting morning happened.




emily's hip. ouch.


so yeah. amaze. in general. and now, to babyshambles.....................

new CD player.
mighty boosh box set
POTC2 dvd
puffing on a coffin nail dvd
boys in the band dvd
waterloo to anywhere album (bad fan)
up the bracket album
the libertines album
black cons, green cons
2 pairs of skinnies
parka


and thats all. looks a lot but the CD's will be cheap and the dvd's cheapish!

yas

carl barat is the best person in the world ever. i can't even talk about it. seriously,i have no words. it was one if the best moments in my life to date. everyone who knows me knows how i feel about carl barat and to meet him and have him act the way he did and SAY WHAT HE DID makes me want to cry.

shut up caroline.

i'd also like to thank jenna and kerry and emily for generally being 3 of the greatest people ever. xxxxxxx

i need your addresses so i can send you both christmas cards plz. 

xxx

haha i'm a pure whinger. read my entry from the other night. jessus. 

feeling better now, although my mum wants to slaughter me. if she doesn't let me stay out on friday night i'm moving to afghanistan for good. i WILL be partying with DPT and other indie sorts on friday night so she can fuck off. 

i'm going to get my hair cut tomorrow so that anthony will fancy me on friday. *ahem* clearly, i am over carl. also, i'm having a minutes silence tomorrow to remember the poor people like myself who won't be going to the kasabian gig.

i had something else to say and now i can't remember. i pure need to move out. this is mainly because my room is such a mess that it will never be clean again and moving out is possibly the only way to save me from asbestos poisening. ooh michael hutchence is attractive.

i wish i had something life changing to write but i never do. ever. i watched Blow last night. EVEN with mad blonde hair sir johnny of depp still looks fit. and when some columbian cunt puts a gun in his mouth i was strangely turned on. hmm......

RIGHT i'll stop typing now. someone leave me pictures or something. but none of carl, cos like i said, over him. xxx

today me and aceface went to braehead and it were a grand old occasion. even though i might be put off smoking for good due to the 20 fags in half an hour we got through between us. BOAK is the word. BOAK i tell thee. then we went to costa and i got a bowl of coffee and a paninininini and a pure rank biscuit that was pretending to be nice. and emily laughed cos i wanted to drown a baby in my bowl of coffee. 

emily stole a nail polish. point and shout at the theif ladies and gents. i tried to steal a ring from topshop but i got AWFULY scared and chickened out for i am crap. 

also, me and emily are starting a farm. an exotic farm with penguins and giraffes and elephants. but also with cows and chickens. ahem.

ALSO, someone buy me the 30th anniversy rocky horror collectors box. i will actually suffer an early death if i don't own it. 

so peter got off with a fine eh? i don't know whether to be happy for him or disgraced at the justice system. i can't remember the posh word kerry uses instead of justice so justice will do fine. and to top it off, i doubt i can afford a ticket for the gig on sunday. *cries into the pillow*

but yeah, don't ever smoke 10 fags in half an hour. it kills. i wish the rain would actually just fuck off. it's pure depressing me to the point of never wanting to leave the house. i'm going to get my hair cut on thursday. gerriiiiin.

someone cheer me up? xx

i am so PISSED off. just very suddenly i feel liks smacking someone in the mouth. and i don't actually have a reason. well i do, but it's probably just me exaggerating a minor situation and being a jealous whingy cunt.

can't be arsed updating properly, so here come the bullet points. 

- an audience with take than was an hour of severe glee. i fancy the pants off of mark owen.
- the new irn-bru advert is genius. whoever thought of that needs a blue peter badge.
- daniel craig is so attractive it hurts. his mouth makes me go funny.
- robin williams is one of the funniest people ever. end of.
- tom meighan needs to be done on several occasions and should never be allowed to sing or dance ever.
- tim curry in rocky horror picture show turns me on more than i care to admit.
- rocky horror is possibly the best musical ever.
- a clockwork orange is not what i imagined. but it's jolly good. i fancy alex.
- i need to find a healthy alternative to cheese and onion crisps. or i'll never lose weight ever.
- after typing out this entry, i reaslise i watch far too much tv.
- thinking about dpt on friday gives me goosebumps.
- someone fancy going to braehead tomorrow?
- i have brokeback mountain and blow to watch tonight. gay cowboys and johnny depp YES!
- i need a haircut. this current one gives me toothache.


this is all.

words cannot comprehend how much i fancy tim curry in rocky horror.

good lord. if more men wore corsets and make-up, the world would be a happier place.
no really. someone come to kasabian with me.
SOMEONE COME TO KASABIAN AND THE FRATELLIS ON THURSDAY NIGHT.

FUCKING FRATELLIS TICKETS WENT ON SALE THIS MORNING AND ARE SOLD OUT ALREADY. 2 DATES IN TEH CARLING ACADEMY. WHAT THE FUCK EVEN IS THAT.

they were nearly sold out last night from pre-sale tickets. how wankered.

are going to be size 8's again. by healthy eating and using my treadmill. and having no beer or cider and only having diet juice with vodka/gin.

watch this space. kate moss can bite it.

1. Where do you hang your towel to dry after showering?
-In teh boiler cupboard. Warm towels a go-go.

2. What kind of mouse pad do you have?
-I don't have one. Laptop innit.

3. Do you brush your hair with a comb or a brush?
-Brush.

4. In your opinion, who do you think is the hottest celebrity?
-Carl Barat.

5. You have a project due tomorrow, do you use tape or glue?
-Glue. I like to make a mess, and glue is clearly the best way to do so.

6. Chicken or pork?
-Chicken.

7. By the time you get to school, is it still dark?
-I tend to not get up til like, half 1 most days. So no.

8. If you had a choice to be a unicorn or mermaid which would it be?
- Marmaid. Because I want merman sex. Ever hear of uniman sex? No.

9. What color is your underwear?
-Blue. But y'know, it does get changed daily so....

10. What time does the sun usually set?
-Like, 4pm. Fucks sake.

11. What/who do you think of last before you go to sleep?
-The DPT poster above my bed and whether they actually can see out of it, as me and Kerry are pure convinced they can.

12. AC or fan?
-AC.

13. Do you wear braces?
-Nope. I used to, not that you'd notice from the pure squintess again.

14. Can you do a hand stand?
-Nope but when I'm drunk, anything is possible. Except for being quiet and getting the key in the door.

15. If you were the opposite sex, how would you style your hair?
-Like Carl Barat. Fucking.Cool.

16. What level English are you in?
-I got a C for higher.

17. Jessica Simpson or Alba?
-Albaaa.

18. Which subject is worse, English or Math?
-Maths. It's the devils subject.

19. What's one thing you really want to do this very moment?
-I want to go out and either take so many drugs I can't move or drink so much that I can't move. (i'm keeping this answer cos it's fucking cool.)

20. What movie are you embarrassed to admit you've watched?
-Rendezvous 4 with Kerry. OMG THE SHAME!!!

21. CD player or iPOD?
- CD Player.

22. Would you rather spin upside down going 30 miles or drop 400 ft. into water?
-Spin at 30mph. I don't care if Kerry say's it would kill me, it would be fun.

23. Whats your favorite shape?
-Rhombus. Oh yes.

24. What do you have planned for the weekend?
-Club Noir if someone isn't a pure wanker about it.

25. Have you ever gone ice skating?
-Yeah. I love it, even though I fear for my life.

26. If you were put in a room with nothing except for a pencil and paper, what would you do?
-Write a letter to the President to ask for a cup of tea.

27. Is it always easy finding your remote every time you want to watch TV?
-Aye it sits on the couch permanantly. How do you spell permanantly?

28. How was your day?
-Pretty good. Went to Jenna's and had toastie's and strawberry bakewells. Until she Pornographied me. Unfair that was.

29. Do you grow your nails, bite or cut them?
-Bite.

30. Describe your handwriting:
-A pure scrawl.

31. Do you consider yourself a stalker?
-Yes. Of the Barat family. Only E-Stalking though and that doesn't count.

32. Do you bruise easily?
-Yeah.

33. There's nothing on TV except Barney and Japanese news what do you do?
-Barney. Oh I love purple dinosaurs.

34. Do you know more then 3 myspace codes
-Like, HTML?

35. You got an essay due, you either can type or write in pen, which will it be?
-Pen. If I even do it.

36. Do you wear jeans to relax at home?
-Nah, I wear jammies.

37. Describe yourself using three words:
-Loud, bad-tempered (it's hyphenated, ONE word), obsessive.

38. Do you use deodorant?
-Yes.

39. Do you like ice in your drink?
-Yeah.

dad: "i'll never slag anyone again after the disaster my daughter has ended up"
mum: "do you not want to act because of your height or looks?"

gawsh. and i know whatever i want to do it'll never be good enough for my mum. what a nice feeling. 

:(

seriously? what even is that? actually, what is his whole new image? he used to be well cool with his eyeliner and pink waistcoats and what not. and now he's gone all texas ranch on us. gods sake. he's so terrified of emo and being compared to emo he's went all gommy. pah.

*whiiiiinge*

i hate men. seriously, i'm considering full time lesbianism. which would be so much easier if i didn't fancy so many men.

gawsh that's such an english phrase. anyhoo, last night was FUCKING amazing. mini bar was grand in itself, i got pished as usual. and slut danced many a time with robert. fun for all the family.

then we went to ABC which was jolly good. it's seriousy the indiest club ever. LOVE IT. robert dancing to "rock the casbah" the way he did was too funny. so yeah fun fun fun as usual with jenna and kerry. <3 ye both. 

however, we got outside and got chippies, and kerry decided it would be the best idea ever to go on a massive detour. en route i saw superman, the guy i pulled at the halloween party. so i was talking to him and dax (his mate and a guy in my work) for a bit then we got clear of them. then later or on i turn around and superman is right beside us. hmm. anyhaa, me being the pissfaced whore that i am gave in and gave him my phone number. which y'know seemed like a good idea at the time, but he's texted me 9 times today. seriously, he needs to sod off. 

and then tonight i was out for dinner with le famile, and i ran into martin, the guy i used to fancy the arse off of. and my stomach flipped so much. and he gave me a big kiss in front of my dad (great idea martin) and he took my phone number (ahem.) but when i was trying to leave we almost pulled (though i realised my dad was watching) and now i can't stop thinking about him. and it's annoying, because i thought i got over him. 

last niggling point, i moan about my lack of <strike>sex</strike> male presence, but superman asked me to go over to his house, and i pure don't want to. and it's heavy daft.

fucks SAKE. i think about things too much.

sometimes i really love my mum. she got me new white converse, and many a top out of primark. yaye! 

perty the night.

i don't know if i like "i get along" or "don't look back into the sun" better. it's terribly upsetting. at least i have narrowed it down to 2. 

also, i am really quite worryingly obsessed with carl barat. like, i thought nothing would out-do my nick out of rooster obsession, but hi@carl, ruiner of teenage lives. and unless you are worryingly obessed with someone too, (jenna, kim.) you don't get it. *woe* i like him even more than michael hutchence. and anyone who knows me well will testify, that's a whole lot of like!!

on the plus side, i get to see this thing of beauty play live in 2 weeks. TWO WEEKS! oh i am awfully excited. and if me and jenna don't meet him, i shall be ever so upset.

this is all.

my days are morphing into one. because i have no life.

yesterday i bought many a pretty thing from primark. yaye! and now i'm allowed to lauren and davids so i can wear my green dress and new boots. YAYE! 

also, if i don't pull someone soon, my lips might fall off. seriously. 

also, me and kim and gem are the coolest. ever. 

kim - save a horse, ride a beckett
gem - save a beckett, ride a skiba
me - save a skiba, ride a barat

class to the Y.

i can't be bothered typing anymore. x

beckett doesn't do it for me. neither does ross. or urie especially anymore.

barat and rossomando are THE FUCKING WAY to go.

deal.
gem and kim are muffsucking lesbians.

Btw, The Upper Room have split up. I am so upset. However will I go on.

Please detect the sarcasm or I really will be upset. This is the best news I've heard in ages. 

Wankers. Who even touches an INXS song? WANKERS I TELL THEE!

*giggles*

i can't believe i went off carl barat for a while. oh god. he is clearly the fittest man the UK has ever produced. ning to the remix. 

also, Waterloo to Anywhere is better than i remember. maybe because i haven't listened to it in a million years because lynsey is a dirty cd theif. 

also, people, come to Club Noir on 2nd of December. burlesque babeeh.
